div.p:
The Siri Speech Tools team is responsible for building tools that are used daily by the Siri Speech team to reproduce production issues, run experiments, manage tests, and analyze data.
Our engineers are expected to operate in a loosely structured environment, build relationships across organizational boundaries, drive feature definition and development, and understand the business and cultural processes behind the technical challenges.
A successful candidate for this position will contribute to creating an internal web application and a web API for the speech recognition services underlying Siri, a cross-functional effort spanning multiple teams and organizations.
B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent
